languages.text: "Усложняющиеся перелеты в варпе мешают нам, но вряд ли составят сколько-то значимую проблему для тех, кто каждодневно якшается с поганым колдовством". {n}Хейнрикс вздыхает.{/n} "После событий на Райкаде Минорис я подозревал, что гнездо культа находится во владениях Винтерскейла, однако из последних донесений ясно, что именно в твоем протекторате еретики нашли надежное прибежище. В составе твоей свиты у меня больше шансов подобраться ближе к их секретам".

traits.locale_text: "Усложняющиеся перелеты в варпе мешают нам, но вряд ли составят сколько-то значимую проблему для тех, кто каждодневно якшается с поганым колдовством". {n}Хейнрикс вздыхает.{/n} "После событий на Райкаде Минорисе я подозревал, что гнездо Культа находится во владениях Винтерскейла, однако из последних донесений ясно, что именно в твоей торговой империи еретики нашли надежное прибежище. В составе твоей свиты у меня больше шансов подобраться ближе к их секретам".

languages.text: "The growing difficulty in making warp jumps is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events on Rykad Minoris, I suspected the cult might have built its nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your protectorate that is harbouring heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."
languages.original_text: "Усложняющиеся перелеты в варпе мешают нам, но вряд ли составят сколько-то значимую проблему для тех, кто каждодневно якшается с поганым колдовством". {n}Хейнрикс вздыхает.{/n} "После событий на Райкаде Минорис я подозревал, что гнездо культа находится во владениях Винтерскейла, однако из последних донесений ясно, что именно в твоем протекторате еретики нашли надежное прибежище. В составе твоей свиты у меня больше шансов подобраться ближе к их секретам".

traits.locale_text: "The growing difficulty of the Warp journeys is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events at Rykad Minoris I suspected the Cult might have woven their nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your merchant empire that is harboring the heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances to get closer to their secrets, and besides, I need to meet one of my observers on the capital world of your merchant empire."

"The growing difficulty of the Warp journeys is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events at Rykad Minoris I suspected the Cult might have woven their nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your merchant empire that is harboring the heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances to get closer to their secrets, and besides, I need to meet one of my observers on the capital world of your merchant empire."

Being in your entourage improves my chances to get closer to their secrets."

Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."

Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."

"The growing difficulty in making warp jumps is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events on Rykad Minoris, I suspected the Cult might have built its nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your protectorate that is harbouring heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."

languages.text: «La creciente dificultad de realizar saltos de disformidad es un grave inconveniente para nosotros, pero dudo que suponga impedimento alguno para quienes practican esa repugnante hechicería día tras día». {n}Heinrix suspira.{/n} «Tras lo sucedido en Rykad Minoris, sospechaba que el Culto tendría su base en los dominios de Winterscale, pero, según los últimos informes, los herejes se refugian en su protectorado. Al formar parte de su séquito, me será más fácil desentrañar sus secretos».
languages.original_text: "The growing difficulty in making warp jumps is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events on Rykad Minoris, I suspected the cult might have built its nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your protectorate that is harbouring heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."

traits.locale_text: «La creciente dificultad de realizar saltos de disformidad es un grave inconveniente para nosotros, pero dudo que suponga impedimento alguno para quienes practican esa repugnante hechicería día tras día». {n}Heinrix suspira.{/n} «Tras lo sucedido en Rykad Minoris, sospechaba que el Culto tendría su base en los dominios de Winterscale, pero, según los últimos informes, los herejes se refugian en su imperio comercial. Al formar parte de su comitiva, me será más fácil desentrañar sus secretos».

languages.text: “亚空间跳跃的难度越来越大，这对我们来说是个不利因素，但对那些日复一日从事邪恶巫术的人来说，恐怕并不会造成什么不便。”{n}海因里希叹了口气。{/n}“小莱卡德发生了那些事情之后，我曾怀疑过那个邪教的老巢可能在温特斯凯尔的领地，但最新的情报表明，这些异端分子躲藏在了你的王朝领地之中。如果能成为你的随行人员，我可以更容易地悄悄接近他们。”
languages.original_text: "The growing difficulty in making warp jumps is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events on Rykad Minoris, I suspected the cult might have built its nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your protectorate that is harbouring heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."

traits.locale_text: “亚空间跳跃的难度越来越大，这对我们来说是个不利因素，但对那些日复一日从事邪恶巫术的人来说，恐怕并不会造成什么不便。”{n}海因里希叹了口气。{/n}“小莱卡德发生了那些事情之后，我曾怀疑过那个邪教的老巢可能在温特斯凯尔的领地，但最新的情报表明，这些异教徒躲藏在了你的贸易帝国里。如果能成为你的随行人员，我可以更容易地悄悄接近他们。”
“亚空间跳跃的难度越来越大，这对我们来说是个不利因素，但对那些日复一日从事邪恶巫术的人来说，恐怕并不会造成什么不便。”{n}海因里希叹了口气。{/n}“小莱卡德发生了那些事情之后，我曾怀疑过那个邪教的老巢可能在温特斯凯尔的领地，但最新的情报表明，这些异端分子躲藏在了你的王朝领地之中。如果能成为你的随行人员，我可以更容易地悄悄接近他们。”

languages.text: 「ワープジャンプがどんどん難しくなればこちら側には弊害がありますが、来る日も来る日も卑劣な魔術に明け暮れる者たちが困る可能性は低いでしょう」{n}ハインリックスはため息をつく。{/n}「我はライカド・ミノリスでの出来事があったことで教団がウィンタースケールの領地に棲家を構えたと睨んでいたのですが、最近の報告によれば異端者を匿っているのは陛下の保護領だというではありませんか。そばにいれば、奴らの秘密に近づける確率が上がるということです」
languages.original_text: "The growing difficulty in making warp jumps is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events on Rykad Minoris, I suspected the cult might have built its nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your protectorate that is harbouring heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."

traits.locale_text: 「ワープジャンプがどんどん難しくなればこちら側には弊害がありますが、来る日も来る日も卑劣な魔術に明け暮れる者たちが困る可能性は低いでしょう」{n}ハインリックスはため息をつく。{/n}「我はライカド・ミノリスでの出来事があったことで教団がウィンタースケールの領地に棲家を構えたと睨んでいたのですが、最近の報告によれば異端者を匿っているのは陛下の保護領だというではありませんか。そばにいれば、奴らの秘密に近づける確率が上がるということです」

「ワープジャンプがどんどん難しくなるとこちら側には弊害があるが、来る日も来る日も卑劣な魔術に明け暮れる者たちが困る可能性は低い」{n}ハインリックスはため息をつく。{/n}「ライカド・ミノリスでの出来事があって、俺は魔女団がウィンタースケイルの領地に棲家を構えたと睨んでいたんだが、最近の報告によれば、異端者を匿っているのはあなたの保護領だというじゃないか。そばにいれば、奴らの秘密に近づける確率が上がる」

languages.text: "Die zunehmende Schwierigkeit, Warpsprünge durchzuführen, ist für uns zwar abträglich, wird jene, die sich tagaus, tagein mit widerlichem Hexenwerk befassen, aber wohl kaum in Verlegenheit bringen." {n}Heinrix seufzt.{/n} "Nach den Ereignissen auf Rykad Minoris nahm ich an, der Kult könnte sich im Herrschaftsbereich von Winterzunder eingenistet haben, aber den neuesten Berichten zufolge ist es Euer Protektorat, das Ketzern Zuflucht gewährt. Als Mitglied Eurer Entourage habe ich bessere Chancen, ihren Geheimnissen näher zu kommen."
languages.original_text: "The growing difficulty in making warp jumps is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events on Rykad Minoris, I suspected the cult might have built its nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your protectorate that is harbouring heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."

traits.locale_text: "Die zunehmende Schwierigkeit, Warpsprünge durchzuführen, ist für uns zwar abträglich, wird jene, die sich tagaus, tagein mit widerlichem Hexenwerk befassen, aber wohl kaum in Verlegenheit bringen." {n}Heinrix nickt.{/n} "Nach den Ereignissen auf Rykad Minoris nahm ich an, der Kult könnte sich im Herrschaftsbereich von Winterscale eingenistet haben, aber den neuesten Berichten zufolge ist es Euer Handelsimperium, das Ketzern Zuflucht gewährt. Als Mitglied Eurer Entourage habe ich bessere Chancen, ihren Geheimnissen näher zu kommen."

"Die zunehmende Schwierigkeit, Warpsprünge durchzuführen, ist für uns zwar abträglich, wird jene, die sich tagaus, tagein mit widerlichem Hexenwerk befassen, aber wohl kaum in Verlegenheit bringen." {n}Heinrix seufzt.{/n} "Nach den Ereignissen auf Rykad Minoris nahm ich an, der Kult könnte sich im Herrschaftsbereich von Winterzunder eingenistet haben, aber den neuesten Berichten zufolge ist es Euer Protektorat, das Ketzern Zuflucht gewährt. Als Mitglied Eurer Entourage habe ich bessere Chancen, ihren Geheimnissen näher zu kommen."

languages.text: « Alors que nous nous heurtons à la difficulté croissante des sauts Warp, il est peu probable que ce soit un obstacle pour ceux qui s'adonnent à la sorcellerie sans vergogne, {n}explique Heinrix avec un soupir.{/n} Après les événements de Rykad Minoris, je soupçonnais que le culte avait bâti son nid dans le domaine des Winterscale, mais si l'on en croit les derniers rapports, c'est en réalité votre protectorat qui abrite des hérétiques. En restant dans votre entourage, j'ai de plus grandes chances de me rapprocher de leurs secrets. »
languages.original_text: "The growing difficulty in making warp jumps is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events on Rykad Minoris, I suspected the cult might have built its nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your protectorate that is harbouring heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."

traits.locale_text: « Alors que nous nous heurtons à la difficulté croissante des sauts Warp, il est peu probable que ce soit un obstacle pour ceux qui s'adonnent à la sorcellerie sans vergogne, {n}explique Heinrix avec un soupir.{/n} Après les événements de Rykad Minoris, je soupçonnais que le culte avait bâti son nid dans le domaine des Winterscale, mais si l'on en croit les derniers rapports, c'est en réalité votre empire commercial qui abrite des hérétiques. En restant dans votre entourage, j'ai de plus grandes chances de me rapprocher de leurs secrets. »

languages.text: "Öte sıçrama yapmanın giderek zorlaşması bizim için büyük sıkıntılar yaratıyor ama gece gündüz kötücül büyülerle uğraşanlar için herhangi bir sorun teşkil edeceğini sanmıyorum." {n}Heinrix iç çekiyor.{/n} "Rykad Minoris'teki olayların ardından tarikatın, Winterscale diyarına yuva kurduğundan şüphelenmiştim. Son gelen raporlar ise kâfirlere ev sahipliği yapanın senin protektoran olduğunu işaret ediyor. Maiyetinde bulunmak, onların sırlarına yaklaşma ihtimalimi artırıyor."
languages.original_text: "The growing difficulty in making warp jumps is detrimental to us but is unlikely to inconvenience those who engage in vile sorcery day in, day out." {n}Heinrix sighs.{/n} "After the events on Rykad Minoris, I suspected the cult might have built its nest inside Winterscale's domain, but the latest reports indicate it is your protectorate that is harbouring heretics. Being in your entourage improves my chances of getting closer to their secrets."

traits.locale_text: "Öte sıçrama yapmanın giderek zorlaşması bizim için büyük sıkıntılar yaratıyor ama gece gündüz kötücül büyülerle uğraşanlar için herhangi bir sorun teşkil edeceğini sanmıyorum." {n}Heinrix iç çekiyor.{/n} "Rykad Minoris'teki olayların ardından tarikatın, Winterscale diyarına yuva kurduğundan şüphelenmiştim. Son gelen raporlar ise kâfirlere ev sahipliği yapanın senin protektoran olduğunu işaret ediyor. Maiyetinde bulunmak, onların sırlarına yaklaşma ihtimalimi artırıyor."
